title: Max MSP 5.06 with Jitter IKB (FIX)
description:
Cycling '74 MAX MSP 5.0.6  with Universal Demo Remover for Leopard and Tiger.

Complaints about universal demo remover. Zipped it.
The Universal Demo Remover program will reset your trial version everytime you start your plist file.

manual:
(have UDR in your apps folder, because you are going to use it everytime you want to reset the trial period)

howto reset the trial of Max MSP 5.06 with universal demo remover:

	ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢	quit all running apps MAKE SURE TO HAVE NO OTHER APP RUNNING
	ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢	run universal demo remover
	ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢	unlock the demo remover
	ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢	Select capture application MAX MSP
	ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢	just before starting up MAX MSP click start capture events
	ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢	after clicking on demo you will see that the FSEvents will go 
                up till around 400. 
	ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢	Click on it and safe plist file with a logical name for 
                instance  "MAX MSP 5". This is the file with the reset
                information.

You only have to follow the instructions for one time. After that you can reset the demo by selecting your product in the plist file (with the name you gave it) and click on remove files after unlocking the window. You will get the massage "Remove demo files This will remove ..... Do you realy want to continue." Don't worry, just click yes. After that the trial is reseted and your good to go for an another 30 days.
